Package tage.audio

package tage.audio
Wrapper for the audio package JOAL.
Author:
Kenneth Barnett
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    tage
    The TAGE core game engine classes.
    tage.audio.joal
     
  • Class
    Description
    AudioEar
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Audio Ears are derived.
    AudioFormat
    The format (file type) of the sound file.
    AudioManager
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Audio Managers are derived.
    AudioManagerFactory
    This class is a Factory for creating audio manager objects -- that is, objects which implement the IAudioManager interface.
    AudioPlayer
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Audio Players are derived.
    AudioResource
    This class represents an audio resource in memory.
    AudioResourceType
    The type of audio resource of the sound file.
    IAudioEar
    The IAudioEar interface exposes the public methods that all audio ears must implement.
    IAudioManager
    The IAudioManager interface exposes the public methods that all audio managers must implement.
    IAudioPlayer
    The IAudioPlayer interface exposes the public methods that all audio players must implement.
    NIterationSound
    This class extends Sound.
    Resource
    Modified from SAGE.
    ResourceType
    Modified from the SAGE Audio package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E.
    Sound
    This class represents a sound (sound effect, music, etc...).
    SoundType
    The type of sound being played such as a sound effect or a track of music.
